subject: Automobiles
lead_paragraph: Will Power led most of the way in the streets of Long Beach, Calif., winning the final race of the Champ Car World Series, the last remnant of the 12-year rivalry between the newly unified American open-wheel series.
snippet: Will Power led most of the way in the streets of Long Beach, Calif., winning the final race of the Champ Car World Series, the last remnant of the 12-year rivalry between the newly unified American open-wheel series.
